Hey，我是王琳，程序员 & 设计师，广东省惠州学院 · 软件工程 2010 级；Forgame · 菲音游戏手游客户端团队成员； 目前任职于菲音游戏 · 凡人手游，负责手游客户端开发。

一些作品和开源项目，👉 戳 Portfolio 与 Github

Learning by doing.
Harder, Luckier.

My name is Wang Lin(王琳)，you can call me nickname Minato. I studied software engineering in HuiZhou University of China, which is a interdisciplinary subject of technology, and now Senior.

As a Programmer, I work at Forgame (in CrunchBase) as the developer of Game Client currently.

Some of my projects is put on my Portfolio 👉 and Github 👉.
